topic.title: Vdelli -  Live & On Fire (2014) 320kbps {FP}-TDR-
topic.body:
Year Of Release: 2014
Label: Jazzhaus Records
Genre: Hard Blues Rock
Country: Australia
Format: MP3
Quality: 320 kbps, 44.1 Khz

Tracklist: EP1
01. Newtown (4:35)
02. Never Going Back (3:28)
03. Dream Girl Nightmare (3:33)
04. Going Too Hard (For Too Long) (3:44)
05. Boogie Sea (3:42)

	EP2
01. Loose Endz (4:10)
02. Into The Zone (4:40)
03. Could Be Good (5:33)
04. She Don’t Care (4:24)
05. Boogie A (3:26)

Line Up:
Michael Vdelli: guitar & vocals
Ric Whittle: drums
Leigh Miller: bass & backing vocals


Formed in Perth, Australia in 1997, VDELLI quickly established themselves in the club scene of the “world’s most isolated city” and within a short period of time the band achieved local success and gained a support slot for ZZ Top on their “XXX Australian Tour” and supported acts such as B.B. King, Buddy Guy and Kenny Wayne Shepherd.
